author: Tony Tellez
title: Florida Gators vs. LSU Tigers Pick Prediction NCAA College Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-17-2015
text:
Florida Gators are off to the road to meet the LSU Tigers   slated for Saturday October 17th. FLORIDA VS LSU   7PM ET 
TV: ESPN 
Point Spread Odds: LSU -6 points 
Notes: The teams met in 2014 with LSU pulling out the 27-24 road victory as a -1 ½ point favorite with the total going over 44 points. Florida is 6-0 on the year following the 21-3 road win last week at the Missouri Tigers as a -6 ½ point wagering favorite. The total went under 38 ½ points. Florida stuffed the Missouri offense by allowing 257 yards of offense with 1 of 16 conversions on third down. The Gators are 11th in scoring defense by limiting opponents to just 14.3 points per game. 
LSU is 5-0 following the 45-24 home victory last week to the South Carolina Gamecocks as a -20 ½ point wagering favorite. The total went over 50 ½ points. The game was moved to LSU because of flooding in South Carolina. The Tigers pounded the Gamecocks defense by gaining 624 offensive yards with 396 rushing for nearly 7 ½ yards per carry. LSU is the third best rushing team in college football by averaging 346 yards per game on the ground. 
Florida Gators versus LSU Tigers
